Class FastFourierTransform

    FFT object, transform amplitudes to frequency intensities

    • Method Detail

      • getMagnitudes

        public double[] getMagnitudes(double[] amplitudes,
                              boolean complex)
        Get the frequency intensities
        Parameters:
        amplitudes - amplitudes of the signal. Format depends on value of complex
        complex - if true, amplitudes is assumed to be complex interlaced (re = even, im = odd), if false amplitudes are assumed to be real valued.
        Returns:
        intensities of each frequency unit: mag[frequency_unit]=intensity

      • getMagnitudes

        public double[] getMagnitudes(double[] amplitudes)
        Get the frequency intensities. Backwards compatible with previous versions w.r.t to number of frequency bins. Use getMagnitudes(amplitudes, true) to get all bins.
        Parameters:
        amplitudes - complex-valued signal to transform. Even indexes are real and odd indexes are img
        Returns:
        intensities of each frequency unit: mag[frequency_unit]=intensity
